title: Library Management System
summary: A modern, responsive Library Management System built with PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, and JavaScript. It manages books, users, and borrowing/returning processes with a smooth, component-driven interface, mobile-friendly design, and optimized performance.
description: The Library Management System is a modern, responsive web application built with PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, and JavaScript. It allows administrators and users to efficiently manage books, catalog entries, and borrowing/returning processes. The system features a component-driven design, smooth checkout workflow, interactive UI elements, and is fully mobile-friendly. Optimized for performance and usability, it delivers a professional experience similar to modern platforms while ensuring maintainable and modular code.

title: POS System
summary: A fast and simple POS system with CRUD product management, image uploads, category filters, and markdown support, built using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JS.
description: The POS (Point of Sale) System is a fast and efficient web application built with PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, and JavaScript. It features a CRUD interface for managing products, including image uploads, category filters, and markdown-enabled content. Designed for simplicity and speed, it provides a clean, user-friendly experience while maintaining modular and maintainable code.
